BASH style regular expression hmangin zawng rawh

Bookmark hmuh tur a awm lo, siam thar leh mek...

Android (SMB) a shared Windows folder a lut dan


Windows ah File Sharing enable rawh

Control Panel hawng la, Network hnuaia HomeGroup leh Sharing options kha click rawh leh Internet-ah te, "Change Advanced Sharing Settings" tih kha click la, "File leh Printer Sharing" tih a ni.


File Sharing setting dangte

Hetah hian advanced sharing setting dangte pawh i configure duh mai thei bawk. 
 Entirnan, i file-te chu i rin vek chuan password tel lovin i enable thei ang i local network-a device awmte chu. File leh printer sharing enable a nih chuan i ti thei tawh ang File Explorer emaw Windows Explorer emaw hawng la, i share duh folder chu right click la, Properties tih kha thlang rawh. 
 Share button kha click la, network-ah folder awm thei turin siam rawh.


Device pahnih hi Wifi khatah a awm ngei ngei tur a ni

He feature hian local network-ah file a siam a, chuvangin i PC leh mobile device-ah te local network khata awm a ngai a ni. Shared Windows folder ah i lut thei lo Internet kaltlangin emaw, i smartphone chu a mobile data-ah a connect a nih chuan â it Wi-Fi nena inzawm a ngai a ni.


IP Address zawng rawh

Command Prompt chu hawng rawh. 'ipconfig' tih type la, Enter kha hmet rawh. Default Gateway zawng rawh i network adapter hnuaiah i router's IP address dah rawh. zawng rawh \"IPv4 Address\" tih chu adapter section ang chiah hnuaiah i computer's IP zawng turin address.


SMB dialog box-ah details ziak rawh

SSL Connection hmanga FTP hman a ni

Host '%1$s' dikna chu a awm thei lo.

%2$s key fingerprint chu %3$s a ni.

Identity confirm turin "Yes" kha tap la; a nih loh chuan "No" tih kha tap la.
PEM thlan chhuah chhiar theih loh: %s
Logon failure: Username leh password pek tawh hmanga authenticate theih loh.
Logon failure: Username leh private key pek hmanga authenticate theih loh.
%1$s:%2$d: %3$s ah connect theih a ni lo
WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION A DAN LO TAK TAK TAK!

MI TEMAW CHU THIL THAWH LO TAK A TI VE ANG!

Tun dinhmunah hian mi pakhatin a lo ngaithla che a ni thei (man-in-the-middle attack)! Host key pawh a thlak danglam chauh pawh a ni thei. Remote host-in public key a thawn fingerprint chu Amaze-a dah nen a inmil lo.

Khawngaihin i system administrator biak emaw, server nena inzawm chhunzawm turin connection thar setup emaw la.
Shortcuts siam hi i launcher hian a support lo.
Color config tih kha thlang rawh
File extension atan \".zip\" hman a tha.
Android tan material design file enkawltu tur a ni
File extension atan \".txt\" hman a tha.
Authentication atan private key thlang rawh
PEM decrypt tur decoder dik tak a awm lo.
Database-a encryption entry update theih loh
He file chungchangah hian info a awm lo
Can\'t, app hnuhnung ber atang khan hawng leh rawh
Thil engemaw a kal sual a, hawn tur a awm lo
File hi a sei lutuk a, edit theih a ni lo a, chutih rualin %d character hmasa berte chu i chhiar thei ang
File hawn chu chhiar theih chauh a ni.
Encrypted File chu hetiang hian save rawh...
Encrypted Folder chu hetiang hian save rawh...

AESCrypt hi AES encryption hmanga siam open source file encryption format a ni. Portable a ni bawk a, platform dang a AESCrypt program hmangin decrypt theih a ni bawk.

A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a, a rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em bawk a. target="_blank">AESCrypt website

Amaze\'s Encryption Format pawh hi AES encryption hmanga siam a ni a; mahse AESCrypt format nen a danglam a, he device hmang chauh hian a decrypt thei a; tin, he device atang hian Amaze File Manager hi uninstall tur a ni lo va, screen lock dan pawh i thlak tur a ni lo, chuti lo chuan encrypted file chu recover theihna tur kawng i nei tawh lovang.
Encrypted file te hian file extension atan \".aze\" an hmang tur a ni.
Encrypted file te hian file extension atan \".aes\" an hmang tur a ni.
File chu \'%s\' tiin save a ni.
%d files te chu save a ni.
File siam chu file list ah a thup ang.
App hian apps install chhunzawm zel turin phalna a mamawh.
Archive chhunga file thenkhat chu lakchhuah theih a ni lo; archive a chhiat emaw, malicious source atanga lo chhuak emaw a ni thei.
Tunah chuan security vangin Android\'s filesystem ah i kal ang. Khawngaihin veilam a list atang hian USB device kha thlang la.
Thilpek min pek avangin lawmthu kan sawi e, hei hian min tichak reng a ni! (:
File hming atan marquee effect enable rawh
Archive \"%s\": %s lakchhuah theih a ni lo
Archive \"%s\" a hawng thei lo. Archive kan hawng thei lo emaw, archive a chhiat emaw pawh nise.
Media browser atang hian thup rawh

MI TEMAW CHU THIL THAWH LO TAK A TI VE ANG!

Tun dinhmunah hian mi pakhatin a lo ngaithla che a ni thei (man-in-the-middle attack)! Host key pawh a thlak danglam chauh pawh a ni thei. Remote host-in public key a thawn fingerprint chu Amaze-a dah nen a inmil lo.

Host fingerprint update chu i kalpui thei a, SSH connection settings update chu i cancel thei bawk.
SD card hmanga siam a ni

Ngaidam rawh, chutiang chu a thleng tur a ni lo.
He error hi e-mail hmangin report rawh
He tihsual hi telegram hmangin report rawh
I crash chungchang sawihona issue a awm tawh em tih enfiah rawh.
Ngaidam rawh, thil a kal dik lo.
App/UI a crash ta a ni
Crash report chu clipboard ah copy a ni
IPC signing check kha titawp rawh (Legacy SMBv1 server tan - UNSAFE!)
Directory %s - %s chhiar theih a ni lo
Default file hawnna apps thlan tawhte a tifai
Root atan legacy listing hmang rawh
Enable a nih chuan file list nan legacy method a hmang thin
RAR archive \"%s\" hi RAR v5 archive thlawp loh a ni.
Hrilhfiahna a awm theih nan FTP server chu i restart a ngai ang.
Archive entry \"%s\" chu \"%s\" ah a extract thei lo.
Drag leh drop duh zawng thlang rawh (Experimental) .
File sawn emaw copy emaw tur chuan touch leh drag rawh
File thlan nan touch leh drag rawh
A dawt leh atan hre reng ang che
FTP server tan SAF access pek theih a ni

Hei hi FTP server i run hmasak ber a nih avangin, device\'s internal storage chu shared folder anga i hman avangin, khawngaihin Amaze chu SAF hmangin storage chu a lut thei ang.\n\n
Hei hi vawi khat chauh i tih a ngai a, a dawt leha insemna tur hmun thar i thlan hma loh chuan.

Android 10 atang khan Android hian directory thenkhatah khapna a siam tawh a, Storage Access Framework hmanga an lut a ngai a ni.\n\nKhawngaihin Amaze chu system\'s file manager atanga directory chu \"Allow Access\" tapping hmangin phalsak rawh.
Android version thar zawka device external storage hman theihna tur support atan hei hi enable rawh

FTP server shared path chu legacy filesystem implementation-a i inthlak leh dawn avangin internal storage-ah reset a ni tawh. Khawngaihin a tul angin a chunglam dinglama menu hmangin path thar thlang rawh.
FTP server shared path chu internal storage ah reset a ni tawh
Root access ngai path i thlang a ni. I device root a nih chuan settings ah root explorer kha enable rawh.
Root access ngai path i thlang a, chu chuan i device-a filesystem pumpuiah read/write operation a ti thei a, a hlauhawm hle - fimkhur loh taka tihsual chuan i device a brick thei!\n\nI chiang em?
Chhiar tur URI \"%s\" hawn a dik lo.
\"%s\" hi archive chhia a ni.\nExtractor atanga thuchah: \"%s\"
He app hmang hian file a hawng thei lo
Amaze File Manager chhung atanga file enkawl dan tur Google DriveTM connection siam rawh.
Google DriveTM hmang turin authenticate rawh
System apps te chu entir rawh
System apps te a awm bawk
Google Play atanga product list lakchhuahnaah error a awm.

Android 11 atang khan Google hian File Manager te hnenah device chhunga file zawng zawng enkawl dan tur user permission dil turin a ngen a ni. A chipchiar zawk chu hetah hian a awm. 

Amaze File Manager pawhin he phalna hi a mamawh a ni. Hetah hian "Grant" i hmet hnuah a hnuaia screen-ah hian Allow access to manage all files option kha thlang la. 

He dialog hi cancel chuan app atang hian a chhuak ang.
User apps te pawh a awm
File manager theme, rawng leh a lan dan tur chu a duh angin i siam thei ang
Eng information nge entir tur tih control la, sidebar chu customize la, UI preferences toggle bawk
Advanced search leh file hawn leh hawn loh ang chi behavior te chu hna thar anga siam danglam
Tun hnaia Amaze kaltlangin files accessed te
Tun hnaia file siam emaw siam danglam emaw
File hawn dan tur a hmu thei lo
Archive dil chu a process thei lo

Amaze File Utilities ah i redirect a ni. Kan open source app a ni a, audio/video/image/document viewers inbuilt a ni a, junk files te chu storage free turin a analyze thei a, Wifi P2P hmangin fast transfer leh thil dang tam tak a awm bawk.\nKhawngaihin min lo en ve teh u.
Wi-Fi P2P hmanga siam a ni
Amaze File Utilities i install avangin lawmthu kan sawi e. App ah i redirect a ni.
Amaze Image Viewer chu a ni

Document entu chu mak ti takin a awm

Google Play policy mandate angin apps te hi a mah chauhin update phal a ni lo. Google Play atang hian app update tur a ni.
File \"%s\" atanga package info hmuh theih loh. File tarlan chu APK a ni lo emaw, package file a chhiat emaw pawh nise.
File i delete hmain confirmation zawt hmasa phawt ang che. Hei hi disabling hi a beidawng hle!
Exporting a hlawhchham: backup file a ziak thei lo
Importing a hlawhchham: backup file chu a chhiar thei lo
Backup file dik lo a awm
Import a hlawhchham a, hei hi:
F-Droid version nen chuan Amaze Cloud Plugin hi a support lo. Amaze Play Store version hmang turin kan ngen a che u.
Player intent filter te kha disable rawh
File chooser atang hian Amaze inbuilt media player te a titawp thin
He thil tum hi handle thei tur app hmuh tur a awm lo. DocumentsUI i install tawh em?
Cloud Connection credentials te chu a clear vek tawh
Vanduaithlak takin i cloud connection credentials te chu database schema thar ah kan migrate thei lo va, app atang hian kan paih chhuak a ngai ta a ni. Khawngaihin cloud connection hi siam leh rawh.
